conclusion: Understand the flow of liquid through the baffles and how it is directed into the containers.
The baffles are labeled A, B, C, and D. The containers are labeled E, F, and G.
The liquid flows from A and is directed into container E.
The liquid flows from B and is directed into container F.
The liquid flows from C and is directed into container F.
The liquid flows from D and is directed into container G.
The yellow liquid from A flows into E.
The green liquid from B flows into F.
The cyan liquid from C flows into F.
The blue liquid from D flows into G.
A: The liquid flows into E.
B: The liquid flows into F.
C: The liquid flows into F.
D: The liquid flows into G.
The liquid from A flows into container E.
The liquid from B flows into container F.
The liquid from C flows into container F.
The liquid from D flows into container G.
